WRITING.TEXT: Captain America Winter Soldier made me appreciate First Avenger more the 2nd time watching it

WRITING.TITLE: Do you think Star Wars 7 will be in the Top 10 Highest grossing films of all time?
WRITING.TEXT: I was looking at the current list and both "Furious 7" and "Avengers: Age of Ultron" are both in it (and still climbing). I'm seriously rooting for The Force Awakens to get into the top 10. Do you reckon it will? + i'd love Spectre to get there too but im not sure that it will.
Skyfall is the best Bond film ever, Casino Royale is awesome but Skyfall is just plainly better IMO

WRITING.TITLE: DCCU: Britt Robertson as "Oracle"
WRITING.TEXT: I thought she was good in Tomorrowland and just thought she's make a good Oracle. I can imagine her in the glasses and wheelchair, but i know that comic readers will have a different opinion to me. what do you guys think of the idea?

for me
Paul Blart 2 Big Game Wild Card Taken 3 etc.

there is no best IMO
